Before the F2P update the game was fine without much cheaters, but after the update, the game became unplayable and full of cheaters. Yes I know that FaceIt or ESEA are a thing, but prime matchmaking is just total shit (BECAUSE OF THE DAMN ANTI-CHEAT). But sometimes the game can be actually fun.

Fun game high skill ceiling but still fun for bad players. gunplay fun and easy to run on most computers or laptops. The main problem with the game is not the game but its comunity there are more hackers on this game then many others. The players are toxic and annoying a lot of the time.

Really good game. The only downside of this game is the broken anti-cheat system. I have no problem with VAC but Overwatch system really really need to be improve. I had friends who got false Overwatch ban and they can't rely on any appeal system. Therefore a lot of skilled players have negative experience with the game so they give up playing. I got it, Overwatch play big part in making every match as clean as possible. Although, everything has its own flaws. If Valve fix this issue i would willingly give them 10/10 but for now, 5.5/10
